features: 500-milliliters of Listerine Clinical Solutions Breath Defense Zero Alcohol Mouthwash in a Smooth Mint flavor, an alcohol-free oral rinse to fight odor for fresh breath all day
The alcohol-free fresh breath mouthwash is powered with odor-neutralizing technology that kills germs, purifies odor molecules and prevents bad breath
This mint oral rinse from Listerine fights odor for fresh breath and delivers triple-action bad breath defense for 24-hours* *when used twice daily
Adults and children 12 and older, use this clinical mouthwash twice daily by swishing with 20 mL for 30 seconds. Children ages 6 to 11, rinse twice daily for 30s with 10 mL. Do not swallow mouthwash

Tested by dentists and hygienists, this ADA-accepted smooth mint mouth rinse aids in the prevention of bad breath for a refreshing mouth feel, making it a perfect addition to your twice daily oral care routine
body.description: Enjoy fresh breath all day long with Listerine Clinical Solutions Breath Defense Zero Alcohol Mouthwash in a Smooth Mint flavor. This alcohol-free mouthwash from Listerine, the #1 dentist recommended mouthwash, provides long-lasting odor-fighting breath protection. This ADA-accepted mouthwash has a triple-action formula powered by odor-neutralizing technology that kills germs, purifies odor molecules, & prevents bad breath for a full 24 hours when used as directed twice daily. Tested by dentists & hygienists, this mouthwash has a fresh & smooth mint flavor for a refreshing whole-mouth feel. The mouthwash contains zero alcohol, and is a great choice for adding to your twice daily oral care routine. For best results, adults & children 12 & older should use this mouthwash twice daily by swishing with 20 mL for 30 seconds. Children ages 6 to 11 should rinse twice daily for 30 seconds with 10 mL of this breath freshening mouthwash. Spit out after swishing. Do not swallow mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less Burn, Fresh Breath
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a big fan of traditional Listerine - it was way too intense for me. But, nobody wants bad breath, so I was interested in trying this alcohol-free formula.I used this at night with my regular dental routine. The formula did give me some tingles, but nothing I couldn't handle and much less intense than regular Listerine. I did choose to rinse out my mouth because I'm not a huge fan of mint taste. One observation - it did make my mouth feel quite dry afterwards.I asked my spouse to check my breath that night and he said it didn't smell like anything, which is a win. Upon waking the next morning, my mouth felt much fresher than normal. I asked my spouse to check again, BEFORE brushing my teeth, and he said it still smelled like nothing! That's a win for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Listerine Clinical Solutions "breath defense" is different compared to the traditional mouth wash that leaves your mouth with that extremely refreshing feeling. This mouthwash definitely has an after taste! -- although not bad, I feel it leaves the mouth feeling very dry - yet clean. What makes this mouth wash different is the advertised clinical breath defense. I have noticed it really helps with mouth odor. You know that unpleasant morning odor? Yep, this helps get rid of it, along with a good toothbrushing session and flossing too -- as everyone should be doing this anyway. Will definitely purchase a bottle once we finish this one in my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clinical, medicinal Listerine
reviews.reviewText: I use mouthwash everyday after brushing my teeth and typically buy Listerine. This mouthwash has a more medicinal flavor and smell than the standard mint mouthwashes they sell, but it’s not too unpleasant. I can’t say that my breath smells all that different than it usually does a full 24 hours after using this mouthwash, as the bottle claims it should. However, my mouth does feel fresher on the mornings and early afternoons when I’ve used this mouthwash even after I’ve drank coffee and tea. I think the price is a little steep for this mouthwash but it may be worth the investment for someone who is struggling to eliminate bad breath caused by bacteria.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alcohol free product.
reviews.reviewText: Listerine Clinical Solutions mouthwash is mint flavored and refreshing. The mouthwash comes in a standard bottle with the directions printed on the back. The mouthwash has a strong minty flavor that really wakes up your mouth. I like the taste and I also like that it is an alcohol free item. Listerine is a good solid brand and this aligns with their standards and pricing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great No Alcohol Mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: I remember the days of loving Listerine and the burn it gave in your mouth, I have since grown up and like something a little less harsh. This checks all the boxes. It still kind of has that same Listerine charm, but with little to no burn and it leaves your mouth feeling clean and also your breath smelling minty! Packaging is like your typical Listerine bottle. Overall, great product, especially for those who might suffer from bad breath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does exactly what it's intended to do
reviews.reviewText: I tried this out in the mornings before brushing my teeth, and indeed it makes a HUGE difference on my breath (my morning breath is pretty bad, so..). The taste/flavor is great too, not as harsh as some other flavors and/or brands, but definitely freshens things up. It comes in a large bottle so it will definitely last a while, and I will be pouring some into a smaller container to keep in my purse for a mid-day fresh-up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mild mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has less of a sting than my original mouthwash which is kinda nice, although I usually rely on that sting to let me know that I have gotten all the areas of my mouth thoroughly. It seems to do its job really well though. It keeps my breath smelling good for long periods. At least until I eat something that changes that. I am not sure any mouthwash can claim fresh smelling breath all day if you are a person that.. ya know actually eats food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Listerine is a bit more mild than the normal one - likely due to the fact that it is an alcohol-free version. It has a pleasant mint flavor and you still feel a bit of a tinge as it works, but not the burn of traditional mouthwash. I do wish that the cap had measuring markings on it. I recommend this if you prefer alcohol-free or don't like the strength of regular Listerine.
